entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 1:10 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:10 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 1:10 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
